content: the first 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st *single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 48 single_crochet round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in the first 5 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next st *single_crochet in next 5 sts 2 single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 56 single_crochet side round 8 *chain 6 skip next 3 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet * repeat from * to * around to last st join w/ slip_stitch in 1st slip_stitch round 9 slip_stitch in next 2 chain of 1st chain-6 space slip_stitch in the same chain-6 space chain 6 *slip_stitch in next chain-6 space chain 6 * repeat from * to * around join w/ slip_stitch to first slip_stitch rnds 10-18 10-20 repeat round 9 round 19 21 slip_stitch in next 2 chain of 1st chain-6 space single_crochet in the same chain-space chain 3 single_crochet chain 3 in each chain-space around join w/ slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet round 20 22 chain 2 counts as 1st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in ea chain and single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 strap row 1 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 half_double_crochet turn 5 double_crochet row 2 chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet then double_crochet in the top of the chain 3 of theprevious row row 3-64 repeat row 2 finish off if you would like a longer strap just keep repeating row 2 until the strap is the desired length sew to the other side of the opening and weave in ends copyright © 2007 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is for the personal use of the buyer only no part of this
